samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control is an overview of how to display and manipulate large data with configuration options.

samples.name: Live Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows how frequently the Grid cell is updated with real-time data.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the default rendering of the grid control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Adaptive Layout
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the Grid row in vertical direction

samples.name: Loading Animation
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the loading indicator when grid loading and refreshing.

samples.name: Empty Record Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component demonstrates usage of template in Grid to shown element or text or image or gif icon instead of displaying the empty record message.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the way for binding a grid with a local data source.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the way of data binding grid with remote service. Grid data source is bound to remote data using DataManager.

samples.name: Flexible Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the way of flexible data binding in grid from various remote services.

samples.name: Column Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates usage of template columns in Grid to shown custom images in the Employee Image column.

samples.name: Header Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the Grid header template feature, we have shown custom icons in the column headers.

samples.name: Stacked Header
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the sorting API in grid. Use the properties panel to sort/unsort columns using API.

samples.name: Foreign Key Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of a foreign key column and perform actions like filtering, sorting and editing.

samples.name: Reorder
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the reordering columns feature. Select column name and index from properties panel to reorder the columns.

samples.name: AutoFit and Resizing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows column rendering with fixed width and resizing feature.

samples.name: Column Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the various column functionalities of the column menu feature.

samples.name: AutoWrap Column Cells
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how the grid cell content is autowrapped to show large cell content.

samples.name: Column Chooser
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how the column chooser feature can be used to show or hide columns dynamically.

samples.name: Show or Hide Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the dynamic show and hide columns feature. Use the properties panel to hide/show the column.

samples.name: Column Spanning
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the grid with column spanning feature to span multiple adjacent cells together.

samples.name: Row Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the row template feature. We have rendered each Grid row using template.

samples.name: Detail Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the grid with detail template feature. Click the expand button to show the detailed information about a row.

samples.name: Drag and Drop
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates how the rows can be dragged between grids using the row drag-and-drop feature.

samples.name: Drag and Drop within Grid
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates how the rows can be dragged within the grids using the row drag-and-drop feature.

samples.name: Row Hover
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the Grid with the row hover feature. Move the mouse over the Grid rows to see the hover effect.

samples.name: Row Height
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the row height feature. Click on the toolbar icons to change row's height.

samples.name: Row Spanning
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the row spanning feature. In this sample, we have spanned row cells together.

samples.name: Inline Editing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the inline editing operation. In the below sample, You can perform CRUD operations in grid.

samples.name: Dialog Editing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to edit grid rows using the Essential JS 2 dialog control.

samples.name: Dialog Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to edit the grid rows using Essential JS 2 dialog-template.

samples.name: Batch Editing
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to perform bulk changes to the grid content using batch edit mode.

samples.name: Command Column
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to edit and delete records using a command column.

samples.name: Multi Sorting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the grid multisorting feature. Using this feature, grid rows can be sorted by two or more columns.

samples.name: Sorting API
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the sorting API in grid. Use the properties panel to sort/unsort columns using API.

samples.name: Default Filtering
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to place a filter bar row in the header to filter grid rows.

samples.name: Filter Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates a way of filtering rows using a menu, check box, and Excel filter UI.

samples.name: Search
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the content searching feature. Use the search box from toolbar to search for records in grid.

samples.name: Pager Dropdown
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how you can display the contents of the grid in page segments using the paging feature.

samples.name: Paging API
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the paging API, use the properties panel to change the pageSize, pageCount and current page.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the grouping feature of the grid control. The grid control has options to group records based on columns.

samples.name: Default Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how the row values can be aggregated and shown in a column footer.

samples.name: Group and Caption Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how the row values can be aggregated for each group of items and shown in a group caption and footer.

samples.name: Reactive Aggregate
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how aggregate values are updated while the row is edited in batch edit mode.

samples.name: Default Selection
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to select rows or cells through simple mouse down or keyboard interaction using the selection feature.

samples.name: Selection API
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the content searching feature. Use the search box from toolbar to search for records in grid.

samples.name: Checkbox Selection
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how the check box selection feature can be used to select grid rows.

samples.name: Hierarchy Grid
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the hierarchical binding feature that helps to build multilevel parent-child relationships.

samples.name: Master/Detail
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows usage of the master/detail in which the details of a Master grid record, is viewed in a separate grid(Detail grid) by clicking the particular row.

samples.name: Default Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the horizontal and vertical scrollbars to view grid content that exceeds the grid area.

samples.name: Sticky Header
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the usage of the Sticky header scrolling to make the grid header visible while scroll its parent element.

samples.name: Frozen Rows and Columns
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows frozen rows/columns feature of grid. Scroll the movable content to view the frozen rows/columns.

samples.name: Frozen API
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows frozen rows/columns feature of grid. Scroll the movable content to view the frozen rows/columns with the content.

samples.name: Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo demonstrates how to use Essential JS 2 grid to show a large data view without performance degradation by rendering only the required rows and columns.

samples.name: Infinite Scrolling
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the Grid component with the infinite scrolling feature.

samples.name: Grouping with Paging
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the usage of the lazy load grouping feature.

samples.name: Grouping with Infinite Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the usage of the lazy load grouping with infinite scrolling.

samples.name: Grouping with Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the usage of the lazy load grouping with virtual scrolling.

samples.name: Default Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the client-side exporting of grid content to Excel, PDF, and CSV formats.

samples.name: Advanced Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates how exporting can be customized to add headers and footers in exported documents.

samples.name: Hierarchy Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates how to export hierarchy grid in exported documents.

samples.name: Detail Template Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the client-side exporting of grid content with Detail template to Excel and PDF formats.

samples.name: Multiple Exporting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the client-side exporting of multiple grid content to Excel and PDF formats.

samples.name: Print
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows how to print the grid content. Click the print button from the toolbar item to print Grid.

samples.name: GridLines
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control demonstrates the visibility of the grid lines that separate the rows and columns.

samples.name: Context Menu
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows demonstrates the usage of context menu in grid. Right click anywhere on the grid to view context menu.

samples.name: Clipboard
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows copy to clipboard functionality of grid. Select rows and click Copy button from toolbar to copy content.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid control shows the events that have been triggered during the grid operations.

samples.name: Keyboard Navigation
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the keyboard navigation in grid

samples.name: RTL
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the Right to left(RTl) alignment
